text: Peter Haggett (24 January 1933â€“9 February 2025) is a British geographer and academic. He was the Professor Emeritus and Senior Research Fellow in Urban and Regional Geography at the School of Geographical Sciences at University of Bristol. Haggett died on 9 February 2025 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2025 deaths Category:British geographers Category:British academics Category:Writers from Somerset
